descript.abstract: The intended purpose of this dataset is to identify the productive and unproductive oyster seed grounds in coastal Louisiana.
descript.purpose: The state maintains large acreages of water bottoms that are designated as public seed grounds and reservations. These public areas are actively managed to provide a steady supply of seed oysters for fishermen to transplant onto private leases. State seed grounds are designated as such by Wildlife and Fisheries Commission action.

idinfo.useconst: LDNR Disclaimer: The information on this Web site has been carefully prepared from the best available sources of data. The Louisiana Department of Natural Resources (LDNR) does not warrant or guarantee its accuracy, nor does LDNR assume any responsibility or liability for any reliance thereon.
